page.title: 10Wellesley Park School
page.content: Life at the school is very active and varied.The curriculum covers all aspects and is skill based rather than on the aquisition of detailed facts. In order to carry this out the local environment is used alot and in the school grounds an environmental studies area has been developed by the children.In their third and fourth years the children also stay at field centres,Greatwood and Chaterhouse. Each year a school play is put on.The children are involved in writing the script and in making the props.At christmas the teachers put on a lightheart production for the children. There are also many clubs the childedren can go to including football,netball,recorders,choir,art, cricket and country dancing.
